Issue.creator: denyeart
Issue.summary: Peer end-to-end tests fail on CouchDB due to chainid **TEST_CHAINID**
Issue.description: create default chain **TEST_CHAINID** failed with Couch DB Error: Name: '**test_chainid**'. Only lowercase characters (a-z), digits (0-9), and any of the characters _, $, (, ), +, -, and / are allowed. Must begin with a letter.
